text: Pascale Roberts (21 October 1930 – 26 October 2019) was a French actress. She was a César Award nominee. In 1957, she married Pierre Mondy but they divorced a few years later. Roberts was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine. Roberts was known for her roles in The Women Couldn't Care Less, The Sleeping Car Murders and in Plus belle la vie. Roberts died on 26 October 2019 in Paris from colorectal cancer at the age of 89.Pascale Roberts, actrice dans "Plus belle la vie", est morte == References == == Other websites == * Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Boulogne- Billancourt Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Pascale Roberts
